mapper.select: SELECT t.teacher_name teacherName ,t.teacher_email teacherEmail ,pf.photo_name photoName ,pf.photo_type photoType ,c.certification_name certificationName ,lp.lec_plan_name lecPlanName FROM teacher t INNER JOIN photo_file pf ON t.teacher_id = pf.member_id INNER JOIN certification c ON t.teacher_id = c.member_id INNER JOIN lec_plan lp ON t.teacher_id = lp.teacher_id WHERE CONCAT( '%', t.teacher_name , '%' ) LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchValue }, '%' )
